services.title: Company Formation and Restructuring
services.subtitle:
One of the major challenges for Brazilian companies is bureaucracy regarding company formation, legalization, permits, and document updates. If not handled correctly, this can lead to fines and even shutdowns.

Our team will actively monitor the entire documentation process from start to finish, ensuring your company operates legally, completely, and with integrity.
checklist: Opening, modification, and closing of companies
Regularization of fiscal and tax status with control agencies
Study and preparation of documents for spin-offs, mergers, incorporations, and acquisitions
Formation of Asset Holding, Control, Family, Pure, Mixed, and Administrative companies
Obtaining Permits and Licenses from City Hall, Fire Department, Health Surveillance, and Environmental clearance
Obtaining Negative Certificates from city, state, and federal revenue agencies
